DOC.brief_summary: The study compares radiation exposure parameters between coronary angiography procedures performed by left wrist, right wrist or groin (femoral) procedure access site
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Evaluation of Vascular Entry Site and Radiation Exposure: REVERE Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Patients referred for coronary angiography will be randomized to either left radial, right radial or femoral arterial access sites, and the coronary angiogram will be performed in a standard fashion, including left ventriculography. Radiation exposure parameters including Air Kerma, Dose-area product, Fluoroscopy time and Operator radiation exposure will be recorded. Operator experience as well as demographic data will be recorded.
DOC.criteria: All patients undergoing diagnostic coronary angiography nonavailability of one or more of the three access sites History of coronary artery bypass graft surgery Need for percutaneous coronary intervention.
